net.sf.smc.parser

Class SmcMessage

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.sf.smc.parser.SmcMessage

  • public final class SmcMessage
extends java.lang.Object
    Stores a warning or error message, the .sm file line number on which it occurred and the FSM's name. The parser and syntax checker do not output errors directly. Instead they store errors in a list and the calling application decides how to present the messages.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static int ERROR
      An error-level message (1).
      static int WARNING
      A warning-level message (0).

    • Constructor Detail

      • SmcMessage

        public SmcMessage(java.lang.String name,
          int lineNumber,
          int level,
          java.lang.String text)
        Creates a message for the given FSM, line number, level and text.
        Parameters:
        name - the finite state machine's name.
        lineNumber - the error's line number.
        level - the message level. Must be either WARNING or ERROR.
        text - the message text.
        Throws:
        java.lang.NullPointerException - if either name or text is null.
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if:
        • name is an empty string.
        • lineNumber is < zero.
        • level is neither WARNING nor ERROR.
        • text is an empty string.
